kDesc
It's the classic room ornaments bundle #1. Includes the Decanter, Ice Bucket, Tumbler, Fancy Glass, and Candles.[#Legal]
Voici un premier pack de décorations classiques. Comprend une carafe, un seau à glaçons, un verre droit, un verre élégant et des bougies.[#Legal]
Das klassische Raumdeko-Set 1! Enthält Karaffe, Eiskühler, Trinkglas, Schmuckglas und Kerzenhalter.[#Legal]
Ecco il pacchetto decorazioni da camera classiche 1. Include decanter, secchiello per ghiaccio, bicchiere elegante e candele. [#Legal]
Conjunto 1 de adornos clásicos. Incluye decantador, cubitera, vaso, copa de fantasía y velas.[#Legal]
It's the classic room ornaments bundle #1. Includes the Classical Decanter, Ice Bucket, Tumbler, Fancy Glass, and Candles.[#Legal]

It's the classic room ornaments bundle #1. Includes the Classical Decanter, Ice Bucket, Tumbler, Fancy Glass, and Candles.[#Legal]
這款古典房間裝飾品組合包1，包括古典雕花玻璃酒瓶、古典冰桶、古典玻璃杯、古典時尚玻璃杯及古典蠟燭。[#Legal]
